name: Marisphere
description:
The first game in the Marisphere series. Did it come out after Marisphere 2? Yes. Is it technically a prequel? No, I'll do what I want lol

Anyway, this is THE game. Well, not just a game, more or less this is an experience. I think it's best for you to see this game yourself, rather than go into detail here. There's not much to explain, anyway. This game can be completed in 3 minutes or 3 hours, depending on your skill. Will you be the fastest? I hope so.

What lies at the end? What happened to Brae before Marisphere 2? Is Bowsette just a trend or is it here to stay? All that and more is answered in Marisphere.

(Mario belongs to Nintendo, Sans belongs to Toby Fox, the song is "Don't Cry, Jennifer" from Clock Tower on SNES. Please support official releases. This game is 100% non-commercial.)

Be sure to follow on Twitter and join my Discord!

Twitter is @LNThracia776

Discord is https://discord.gg/ehVBucB
